mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.boardTitle, u.userName, b.boardHit, b.boardRegDate, b.boardModDate, b.writeUserNo FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.writeUserNo = u.userNo ORDER BY boardNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES ( seq_board_no.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContext}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{writeUserNo} )
